entry.title: FOG ADVISORY, Maple Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:27 a.m. CST Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Fog dissipating. High minus 7 except minus 2 near the Trans-Canada Highway.
entry.summary: Fog dissipating this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7 except minus 2 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17 except minus 10 near the Trans-Canada Highway.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17 except minus 10 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5 except zero near the Trans-Canada Highway.
